buildings.name: Museum
buildings.description: Catalog and restore ancient artifacts. Archaeologists uncover lost treasures.

tiers.flavorText: Slaying enemies channels spirits of the past.
Fossil energy restores vitality on crits.
Ancient wisdom grants great healing on crits.
Ancient tome wards grant near immunity.
Ancient tome wisdom grants godlike favor.
Ancient coins hold a spark of eternal life.
Fossils preserve life from ancient times.
Relics of the immortals deny death.
Ancient tome secrets grant true immortality.
